What are some common natural disasters and their related phrases? Can you provide some XML data to illustrate this?
Here is an example of XML data for natural disasters and their related phrases:
<natural_disasters>
  <disaster>
    <name>Earthquake</name>
    <phrases>
      <phrase>ground shaking</phrase>
      <phrase>seismic activity</phrase>
      <phrase>fault line</phrase>
    </phrases>
  </disaster>
  <disaster>
    <name>Hurricane</name>
    <phrases>
      <phrase>strong winds</phrase>
      <phrase>storm surge</phrase>
      <phrase>eye of the hurricane</phrase>
    </phrases>
  </disaster>
  <disaster>
    <name>Flood</name>
    <phrases>
      <phrase>rising waters</phrase>
      <phrase>flash flood</phrase>
      <phrase>levee break</phrase>
    </phrases>
  </disaster>
</natural_disasters>
